snippet: The defending champion Adam Scott of Australia three-putted for bogey on the seventh hole of a playoff to hand the Australian P.G.A. Championship to Greg Chalmers.
abstract: Greg Chalmers wins Australian PGA Championship with eight-under 64; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Adam Scott of Australia three-putted for bogey on the seventh hole of a playoff to hand the Australian P.G.A. Championship to Greg Chalmers.
